lead_paragraph: SUSSMAN--Harold, born April 20, 1922, died New York City on February 20, 2016. Served WWII (LCI (G) 461; LCI (G) 373) in eight Pacific invasions. Reported missing/dead, given posthumous BA, University of Illinois, February 1945. Taught anthropology Brooklyn campus New York City Community College and LIU; teacher PS142, Manhattan. Loving husband and father. Survived by wife Madeleine, all three children; sons-in-law, and two grandchildren. Memorial service: Grace Church, 802 Broadway, April 9 at 1pm. 1/3
